page.title: 05OLD WILLS FARM
page.content: Old Wills farm is owned by {Mr. {Crayston.}Mr.Crayston's family owns 770 acres altogether.He owns 325 acres by Old Wills farm and 225 acres at Pebmarsh. He shares all the farm machinery between him and his brother. They own 5 tractors and 2 combine-harvesters. Mr.Crayston has 2 helpers incuding his brother.In the harvest time he has a student who only helps for 8 weeks.He is building a galvanized metal barn.He already has a series of seed silo.The farm house is quite old.It is in 3 sections.1 section at 1 end dates back 1420,then it had 1 room down stairs and another room for the cattle and a loft upstairs for the owners to live in. The fire place dates back to 1525 and the other end was stripped in 1928 and done up.Mr.Crayston grows rape too.
